TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit DeviceNotFoundException extends Microsoft.Azure.Devices.Client.Exceptions.IotHubException

Docs.summary: The exception that is thrown when an attempt to communicate with a device fails because the given device identifier cannot be found.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string deviceId) cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the message string containing the device identifier that could not be found.

Docs.param: An object that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
An object that contains contextual information about the source or destination.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, class System.Exception innerException) cil managed

Docs.param: A description of the error. The content of message is intended to be understood by humans. The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the message string containing the identifier of the device that could not be found and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
